textSection.title: IdealTechno specializes in the development and application of robotic systems for various manufacturing processes and areas of application.
textSection.subtitle: Our company is ready to design the required robotic system tailored to the individual needs of the client

first.title: Welding Robotic Cell #1
first.subtitle: This project was implemented to automate the welding of a 'knuckle'-type product while minimizing the production cycle time.

second.title: Equipment
second.subtitle:
-Nozzle cleaning unit
-Industrial robot
-Protective enclosure
-Welding machine
-Rotary table
-Jig

first.title: Welding Robotic Cell #2
first.subtitle: A project for automating the welding process of large-sized products using a linear axis to move the robot mounted on a pedestal along the workpiece, and a horizontal positioner for setting up the future product.

first.title: Welding Robotic Cell #3
first.subtitle: This cell was designed to automate the metal surfacing process.

second.title: Equipment
second.subtitle:
-Nozzle cleaning unit
-Industrial robot
-Protective enclosure
-Welding machine
-Rotary table
-Jig

first.title: Robotic Factory
first.subtitle: A full-cycle production facility for manufacturing MDF boards using industrial robots, automated systems, and machine vision.

second.title: Equipment

first.title: Welding Robotic Cell #4
first.subtitle: An automated welding cell based on an industrial robot, using a peripheral device and a jig designed to accommodate the specific dimensions of the metal structure.
